metadata.description: Tutorial: Evening arrival at Brass Bell Inn, work for shelter
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

venues.name: The Brass Bell Inn
venues.description: A warm inn where lamplight spills from windows. Inside: warmth, food, safety. The common room hums with evening conversations.

venues.name: Town Square
venues.description: The heart of the town, where traders gather and townsfolk meet. The Brass Bell Inn beckons from across the square.

locations.name: Town Square Center
locations.description: You've been walking since dawn. Your legs ache, your coin purse feels light, and the sun is setting. The warm glow of The Brass Bell Inn beckons from across the square.

locations.name: Common Room
locations.description: Lamplight spills from windows. Inside: warmth, food, safety. The common room hums with evening conversations. Elena, the innkeeper, wipes down tables while watching travelers settle in for the night.

locations.name: Upstairs Room
locations.description: A simple guest room. Quiet, safe. A bed waits.

locations.name: Fountain Plaza
locations.description: The town fountain. Locals gather here to chat and trade news. A courier's board posts delivery opportunities.
